title: 我装不了modloader
author: majun
txt_content:
我再把modloadere解压到minecraft时系统说发生错误...
他说：
!   无法把 __rzi_0.967 重命名为 C:\Game962\Minecraft1.4.6\Minecraft\.minecraft\bin\minecraft.jar
    The process cannot access the file because it is being used by another process.

replies.author: zhouzhou
replies.txt_content:
你没删除一个东东，那个叫META-INF……删掉
然后才能装

replies.author: 天空の遗迹
replies.txt_content: minecraft.jar正在被占用……把MC关掉再装……
